price: 27. Ekotikala sé elongi ya Nkolo nayo atonda lukumu mpe boboto.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
